comment.body:
> Yes I don't know what global protection is

It's the switch that you see in the main window. That's what you have in the first seconds of the video. Btw, I also got it.

> but it's the same even after turning off all the filters, i.e. “ad blocking”, “tracking protection”, “annoying item blocking” and “navigation protection”, which I have turned on under the name of protection.
If I turn off the Adguard from the tick mark on the app home page, the video plays.

Hm, seems that might be related to the app as you have checked with disabled modules. Could you file an issue [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/) - New Issue - Bug Report? Note that some forms, such as filters or other modules, can be left blank. Please also attach your video by mentioning the link.

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.
